name: FractalHelper
description: Lets make fractales way more easy. With skips and tactics and brain.exe.

progression.details: Needed to get some information what you know, what you can do on your own or what you had done recently.

builds.details: Needed to give you some hints about your skills.

inventories.details: Needed to remember you about some missing items and to detect what you just finished.

account.details: Needed if you want the special feature enabled.

characters.details: Needed to review the item in your inventory.

tradingpost.details: Needed to review the item in your inventory.

wallet.details: Needed to review the item in your inventory.

pvp.details: Needed to review the item in your inventory.

guilds.details: Needed to review the item in your inventory.
